Name: Skywalk
About the game: Skywalk is a 3D first-person platformer. The basis of its gameplay is running on floating platforms which can move or be static, can fall or disappear. All this with different kind of puzzles and traps. The game has no tips and you will learn through your mistakes. Your goal is to complete 10 challenging levels and to reach the floating isle where you will need to launch a non-working wind turbine. Itâ€™s a remastered version of the game Platformica, based on Unreal Engine 4. ! Important ! Some levels can make you very nervous. Specifically for this a beautiful and soothing ambient soundtrack was written. Have a fun play
